last_run_time.description: Timestamp of the last test execution

last_passing_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last successful test execution

last_failure_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the last failed test execution

last_error_message.description: Error message from the last failed execution (truncated to 512 chars)

execution_duration.description: Duration of the last test execution in seconds

execution_count.description: Total number of times this test has been executed

average_duration.description: Average execution duration across all runs

success_rate.description: Success rate as a decimal (0.0 to 1.0)

execution_tracking_enabled.description: Indicates if execution tracking is enabled for this test

last_enhanced.description: Timestamp when the entry was last enhanced
